description: We take a look at mission rules in Pariah Nexus and how they affect faction win rates.
title: Hammer of Math: Battleline Mission Rules in Pariah Nexus

description: The response to my last Warhammer Tacticus column was surprising and gratifying.  I figured I’d just share my thoughts about a mobile game that has made me smile over the last few months, but it turns out that there is more of an audience for this sort of thing than I expected.  Lots of Warhammer […]
title: Why Can’t I Hold All These Orbs: A Guide to Currency in Warhammer 40K Tacticus

description: It’s an exciting time to be a Warcry player. With absolutely no warning whatsoever, Games Workshop came in and added allegiance abilities to the entire game in the new Briar and Bone boxed set. We’re calling them “battle traits,” and will be breaking down how each of them works. Many thanks to GW for sending […]
title: Warcry – Battle Traits Review: Grand Alliance Death

description: We’re back with another review; this time the Jupiter SE, which is by far their largest resin printer offering. We would like to once again thank Elegoo for generously providing units for us to review, and as before they had no influence over the article itself. At this stage you should be familiar with our […]
title: I Like Big Vats and I Cannot Lie: Goonhammer Reviews the Elegoo Jupiter SE

description: The German Army of the first World War was one of the strongest military forces in the world at the time. They entered the war with flashy Pickelhauben and fancy moustaches. But as the war went on, they had to adapt to the new type of Warfare, slowly phasing out the more fancy aspects of […]
title: How to Paint Everything: World War I German Infantry

description: Tyler catches up with Jason and Travis to talk about Tacoma, and the Pacific Northwest region. Along with some fighting words about the best pizza in the US.
